articles.title: Virginia lawmaker criticized for detention center work
articles.description: ARLINGTON, Va. (AP) — A Latino lawmaker in Virginia is being criticized for his work for an immigration detention center.

articles.author: The Associated Press
articles.title: Virginia lawmaker criticized for detention center work
articles.description: ARLINGTON, Va. (AP) — A Latino lawmaker in Virginia is being criticized for his work for an immigration detention center. Del. Alfonso Lopez is a Democrat who has represented a South Arlington district with a significant Hispanic population since 2012. The Wa…
